changeSet.author: system
changeSet.comment: Clean up topics table: Set content_url to empty string for invalid data (non-URL content)
changeSet.sql: UPDATE topics SET content_url = '', updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE content_url IS NOT NULL AND content_url != '' AND content_url !~ '^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9+.-]*://';

rollback.comment: No rollback - data was invalid and cannot be restored
